title: Distracting Strike
content:
ure in Baldur's Gate 3. Distracting Strike grants a simple way to give your allies Advantage against the distracted enemy. Features provide unique abilities that are inherent to a Character's Race, Class, Background selected. These may vary greatly, from allowing you to equip certain Weapons or pieces of Armor with Proficiency, to add your Proficiency Bonus to certain Saving Throws.

Distracting Strike Information

Distract your target, giving your allies Advantage on their next Attack Roll agai
